DanceDuelist.description2: Dances can be used by any characters of the appropriate class.

TradeableSeraphWings.name: Tradeable Seraph Wings
TradeableSeraphWings.description: Adds the ornate Seraph Wings to your body armour. Can be traded between players before it has been used on an item.
TradeableSeraphWings.description2: Back attachments can be applied in the Cosmetics tab of your Inventory.

GamepediaBookPet.description: Summons a glowing grimoire which follows you around.
GamepediaBookPet.description2: Pets can be placed in your personal Hideout or assigned to follow your character around.

TradeableSeraphWeaponEffect.description2: Weapon effects can be applied in the Cosmetics tab of your Inventory. They apply to any weapons you equip.

TradeableEtherealPoisonArrow.description2: Skill effects can only be applied to one gem at a time but can be reclaimed and moved between gems for free.
